name: MEGA-C™ 30% Vitamin C Brightening Mask
about: What it is:A creamy, power-packed, brightening face mask that visibly evens skin tone and diminishes dark spots..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Fine Lines and Wrinkles, and Dullness.Formulation:Mask.Highlighted Ingredients:- 30% Pure Vitamin C: Visibly brightens and evens skin tone, boosts firmness and elasticity, and reduces and fades hyperpigmentation..Ingredient Callouts:Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This facial in a tube reveals brighter-, stronger-, more radiant-looking skin in as little as two uses. It is packed with a 30 percent dose of ascorbic acid, the most potent yet and stable form of vitamin C. This mask also helps to visibly lift and firm while sea buckthorn oil and ceramides soothe and nourish the skin barrier..Clinical Results:Based on an independent clinical study, after 2 uses:
ingredients: -30% Pure Vitamin C: Visibly brightens and evens skin tone, boosts firmness and elasticity, and reduces and fades hyperpigmentation..-Age Repair Complex: Reduces the appearance of wrinkles and restores more youthful-looking skin..-Sea Buckthorn Oil and Ceramides: Visibly restore skin’s natural lipids for remarkably softer, smoother skin...Dimethicone, Ascorbic Acid, Polysilicone-11, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Hippophae Rhamnoides Fruit Oil, Divinyldimethicone/Dimethicone/Phenylsilsesquioxane Crosspolymer, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Brassica Campestris (Rapeseed) Seed Oil, Bisabolol, Glycyrrhiza Glabra (Licorice) Root Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Niacinamide, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Leaf Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Oil, Zingiber Officinale (Ginger) Root Extract, Ceramide Np, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Ubiquinone, Astragalus Membranaceus Root Extract, Spilanthes Acmella Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Althaea Officinalis Root Extract, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Limonene.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Use AM or PM. .-Use one to two times per a week. .-Apply a thin, even layer on clean, dry skin. .-Allow the product to sit on skin for up to 20 minutes before washing off. .-Rinse with cool water to remove all product. .-Repeat cleanse if desired. .-Follow with your usual moisturizer. .-Be sure to use with SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After eyeing it for a good 6 months, I finally bought this during the sale. And after four uses, I’m honestly so confused because this mask does *nothing* for my skin.   Not only does the mask do absolutely nothing to brighten or reduce my (very faint) sunspots, it also has a weird waxy texture that’s extremely hard to wash off. I follow the instructions every time but always have to wash again with one of my cleansers afterwards because it literally will not come off my skin otherwise (and Seabuckthorn, which is what makes the product yellow, absolutely will stain your clothes and pillowcases).   I am wondering if maybe I got a bad batch, which is why I’m giving an extra star. I imagine it must work for someone in order for it be be on Allure’s list, but wow was it a disappointment for me. I’ve had better luck with the Korres Vitamin C line, so I think I’m just going to stick with what I know works instead.

My dermatologist recommended using the vitamin C mask once a week, but advised applying it at night before bed and using more sunscreen the following day.

reviews.review_title: Feels greasy but leaves face soft and smooth
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Product was gifted by Kate Somerville in exchange for my honest review. This mask claims to even skin tone and diminish dark spots. I applied a thin layer to dry skin and left on for 10 minutes because I have sensitive skin (instructions are to leave on for 20 min unless you have sensitive skin). The mask feels greasy and as I apply it, I can feel my hands getting greasy. It has an oily undertone. After I rinsed off, there is a film that remains. I had to wash off with a cleanser to fully remove the film. I didn’t notice my dark spots fading but I did notice how soft and smooth my face felt.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Feeling SO glowy and radiant!!! This is such an easy step to incorporate and into my weekly routine and leaves my skin sooo smooth. Love it so much I am so glad I tried it !!!!!!gifted by Kate Somerville

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Vitamin C is one of my favorite ingredients, so I was excited to try this mask! But as soon I smelled the (admittedly pleasant) fragrance, I had a feeling things would go badly. Sure enough, I was left with irritated, bumpy skin. I’ve used even higher concentrations of vitamin C before without issue, but my skin consistently has issues with essential oils and limonene, which I am bummed are in this product. If they could just remove the perfume (that doesn’t do anything beneficial!), they’d be left with a five star product instead of one that people with sensitive skin should avoid. This was gifted by the brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Katesomerville gifted me this has made my skin so bright and radiant after first use this is a great product if you have dull skin. I have sensitive dry skin and this has improved my skin tremendously.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin

The mask is bright yellow and thick in texture. I use it 2 times a week to give my skin a reset and it truly does give me results. It has made my skin look so much brighter, my complexion looks more even, and I definitely notice my dark spots have faded. I love the healthy glow I get from using it and gow silky smooth my skin feels. It works well for my combination skin and I've had no irritation, but there is a slight tingling.  If you have sensitive skin, I would do a patch test first. This mask is a new favorite of mine and a great addition to my skincare routine. Overall I definitely recommend!

The first thing I noticed after rinsing my hands (I applied the mega c to my hands too) was the waterproof barrier like I applied oil. The instant brightening is amazing and the matte finish is perfect especially as I have an oily t zone. I'm really i lmpressed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the texture of this mask is super unique, it glides on and isn’t too thick, but the bright color makes it easy to see if you have even coverage. My skin is on the sensitive side and 10 minutes is the max I keep it on, that’s only half the recommended time, and I still have been getting great results. This mask takes a little bit of work to remove and I opt for a double cleanse to really make sure there’s no residue left behind. Now, the results - my skin has felt so much smoother, at first it was just a little bit in some of the splotchy areas of my face (above brow line, etc) but I’m noticing my whole face is looking so fresh! Dry patches are on the decline and I’m loving it. I do have some sun damage and I’m really excited to see just how much this mask can do, but so far the reduction of dry patches is really promising. Gifted by Kate Somerville.

reviews.review_text: Hey Beauties!   #KateSommervilleSkincareGiftedMe their MEGA-C™ 30% Vitamin C Brightening Facial!   Kate’s NEW power-packed 30% Vitamin C face mask evens skin tone and diminishes dark spots fast. In just 2 uses, this creamy, wash-off mask, formulated with clinic-level encapsulated Pure Vitamin C brightens and improves overall skin tone. Innovative Age Repair Complex helps lift and firm while soothing Sea Buckthorn Oil and Ceramides work together to restore your skin barrier. So long, lackluster skin! Hello, glow.   Key Ingredients: 30% Pure Vitamin C (Ascorbic Acid)~ Minimizes photoaging, brightens and evens skin tone, boosts firmness and elasticity, and reduces and fades hyperpigmentation   Age Repair Complex~ Instantly smooths and lifts skin, reducing the appearance of wrinkles   Sea Buckthorn Oil & Ceramides~ Helps strengthen and reinforce the skin barrier while restoring skin’s natural lipids.   Bisabolol & Ginger Root Extract~ Calms skin and helps minimize irritation.   Plus, this is Certified Cruelty Free by PETA!   This super happy creamy bright yellow mask is super potent yet gentle enough on my sensitive skin. I've used this twice, and I'm just loving it. So far, I've seen that my skin tone looks a bit more even. It smoothed my skin and looked brighter. I can't wait to keep using this to see the long-term effects. You can also use this as a treatment for your hands, chest, and back, pretty much anywhere that you have hyperpigmentation. It's like an at home spa.    Product Shown: @KateSommervilleSkincare~ MEGA-C™ 30% Vitamin C Brightening Facial
